text: Diamonds Are Forever is a 1971 British spy movie directed by Guy Hamilton and is the 7th movie in the James Bond franchise. It is based on the 1956 novel of the same name by Ian Fleming and starring Sean Connery, Jill St. John, Charles Gray, Lana Wood, Jimmy Dean, Bruce Cabot. It was distributed by United Artists. Shirley Bassey sings the title song of the movie. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1971 movies Category:1970s spy movies Category:James Bond movies Category:Movies directed by Guy Hamilton Category:Movies set in the Netherlands Category:Movies set in Switzerland Category:Movies set in the United States Category:Movies composed by John Barry
title: Diamonds Are Forever (movie)
